member.name: MF_MEDIAKEYSESSION_MESSAGETYPE
member.summary: Specifies the type of a Content Decryption Module (CDM) message.

member.name: MF_MEDIAKEYSESSION_MESSAGETYPE.MF_MEDIAKEYSESSION_MESSAGETYPE_LICENSE_REQUEST
member.summary: The message contains a request for a new license.

member.name: MF_MEDIAKEYSESSION_MESSAGETYPE.MF_MEDIAKEYSESSION_MESSAGETYPE_LICENSE_RENEWAL
member.summary: The message contains a request to renew an existing license.

member.name: MF_MEDIAKEYSESSION_MESSAGETYPE.MF_MEDIAKEYSESSION_MESSAGETYPE_LICENSE_RELEASE
member.summary: The message contains a record of license destruction.

member.name: MF_MEDIAKEYSESSION_MESSAGETYPE.MF_MEDIAKEYSESSION_MESSAGETYPE_INDIVIDUALIZATION_REQUEST
member.summary: The message contains a request for App-Assisted Individualization (or re-individualization).
